name: She is my Universe
description:
She is my Universe

The worlds first VR Flea Sim

This is my entry for #js13k 2017 - js13kgames.com

The theme was 'lost'

Instructions

Hey little flea, you've lost your hairy tasty host.
Where could she be?
Hop to it and find her.

Big yellow cursor = look to hop Small red cursor = suck blood Orange cursor = does nothing Look at stuff to interact (setup for Google Cardboard).

Details

Total compressed size for this game is ~12kb and I could've made it even smaller.

Has not been tested using any VR headsets

Works on desktop in Chrome and Firefox, although it is a bit glitchy.

Occasionally the flea requires several attempts to get a bite.

Sssh

I hid a NSFW toggle in the room somewhere. Check the nightstand.
